summary:
6+ years of experience in Software Development in Azure for Microsoft. 

Designed and implemented:
- Login, logout, profile (identity) and banner notification across Azure Collaborative Service UI. Used AAD, Microsoft.Graph, MSAL.JS, React.Js, Redux;

- Architecture for Server/Agent less Pipeline tasks in Azure DevOps as part of Release Management team. Also SPEAR HEADED the first Server/Agent less task: Invoke Rest/Function API. Used to run MILLIONS of tasks every day.

- SQL Database for DevOps Starter in Azure: https://ms.portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.AzureProject
Created new Azure Resource Provider in Azure DevOps.
Designed and implemented complete database requirements

- Designed and implemented: Reuse existing Azure resources capability (like: Azure Kubernetes or Azure service fabric clusters, Azure Webapps, Azure docker container registries etc.)
This spanned across the UX, Service, Arm templates, Database.

Open Source World:
- Lead .NET Core deployment environment in Azure DevOps while interacting with clients and building the required capabilities in Azure DevOps offerings to support all .NET Core versions.

- Contributed to open source repositories in GitHub to create and maintain some of the most used tasks in Azure DevOps: Azure CLI, Azure ARM template deployment, Service Fabric Deployment.

Identity and Authentication:
- Build Auth N/Z capabilities for our website and service using MSAL.Js, MSAL.NET and ADAL. Also supported both AAD backed accounts and personal accounts to be able to login and use our service, while doing tenant discovery on the backend.

- Educated and helped many other teams in our organizations to bootstrap authentication and identity in their services

Profound knowledge of:
Azure Active Directory, Azure Synapse, Azure Service Fabric, Async programming, DevOps, REST API, MSAL and ADAL, Managed Identities, Azure Web Apps, Azure Kubernetes, Azure Cosmos DB, ETL on data using Azure Technologies.

Know about:
Distributed orchestrations, Database query optimization, Worker/Background job architecture,

projects.title: Generating Azure Synapse pipelines to merge data adhering to a data model while collaborating from multiple locations
projects.description:
Designed and implemented: Merge pipelines feature for AICS service, involving: integrations with 7 other Azure and AAD services (Azure Resource Manager, Azure Storage, Azure data share, Azure Synapse, Azure IDW, Microsoft Graph, Azure Active Directories)

- We explored the various options of the final design for the generated pipeline by using different available tasks/automation jobs in Azure Synapse 
- Designed and scoped the new resource type in respect to the existing resources and maintained the ARM proxy resource stage for the new resource type
- Database changes to accommodate merge pipelines in respect of Data models of a Custodian Collaborative resource
- Implemented the core job/worker logic for the long running process of generating required pre-requisites, generating pipeline, triggering the pipeline, polling and updating the result into the database
- Designed with extensibility and modularity in mind, so that later new data packages could also be accommodated inside existing pipelines, removing the need to generate new ones.
- Setup the S2S authentication for cross service bilateral talk.

projects.title: Authentication and Identity framework for Azure PAAS service
projects.description:
Auth N/Z:
- Designed and Implemented: Authentication and authorization framework for UX and Service for different environments: Dev, Test, Pre-prod, Prod.
- Onboarded to both: Certificate and JWT token based authentication schemes with different intended clients
- Supported Live/Personal accounts as well as AAD backed accounts
- Added support for AAD apps/SPN to be able to interact with the service.

Identities:
- Designed the integration of Managed Identities for Azure Resources into our service
- Spear headed the Managed Identities world while making it work in all environments and making developer experience smooth
- Secret storage, rotation, caching  and regional endpoint discovery to improve resiliency and decrease impact of AAD latency and secret replication

Helping others:
- Educated and helped many teams (5+) in getting the Auth N/Z and Identity story right.
- Shared service authentication and token exchange platform. This was later directly consumed by two other teams

Initiatives:
- Created automated alerts and monitors for Auth failures in different regions
- Matured the code through various changes about Zero Touch Secret rotation (certificates)
- Token encryption and decryption for added security
- Sharing and establishing best practices for Secret management across teams in our organization.

projects.title: ARM template deployment engine in Azure Collaborative Service's UX
projects.description:
Designed and Implemented the reusable engine for deployment ARM templates from our UX based on REACT.JS:
- It would stich up complex, multi layered, dependent ARM templates to deploy multiple resources and provision role assignments all at once.
- Poll for final state while the deployment is in progress and then parse and show the result to the end user in UX
- Created environment profiles in UX and utilized browser session storage to make engine intelligently choose the right set of resources to be created and the endpoints to be used

Eventually all our resources and actions used to deploy ARM templates.

projects.title: Built new first party (in-box) Azure Resource Provider for ground up
projects.description:
- Registered new Azure Resource Provider with Azure and created its manifest
- Modeled resources of different types adhering to Azure guidelines, such as: tracked, proxy, tenant level in the RP manifest and did corresponding implementation in the service
- Setting up of certificates and getting domains for the service
- Created Feature flags to keep the RP and service hidden from the world and only allow access to select few customers
- Setup the right RBAC validations for dependent resource creation, leveraging ARM provided framework

projects.title: Deploy to Azure: VS Code Extension
projects.description:
‘Deploy to Azure’ – Extension for VS-Code IDE: 
Designed, Implemented and Launched (Microsoft Ignite conference, 2019) the extension. It analyses user’s code to bring out suggestions of Azure services to which customer’s code can be deployed to. The auto setup CI/CD pipelines in Azure Pipelines or GitHub Actions for the user based on their selection:
-	Designed and implemented Code Analyzer: Analyze code repository to produce the detected languages used and possible azure service to which user’s code can be deployed to.
-	Designed and implemented: Auto create YAML CI/CD pipeline for user’s code repository. Check in the YAML file and create CI/CD pipeline in Azure Pipelines/GitHub Repo.
-	Setup authentication with Azure Repos, Azure Pipelines and GitHub
-	Setup telemetry, monitoring system, and CI/CD pipeline for the extension.
Designed Parameterization Model of YAML Pipeline templates being consumed across Azure Pipelines, GitHub Actions, VS Code, VS IDE, AZ CLI and DevOps Project on Azure: 
Designed the structure of templates, to contain relevant metadata using which suggestion engine performance can be enhanced.

projects.title: Azure DevOps project
projects.description:
Designed and developed underlying database and API later to store and fetch CI/CD pipeline information.
Created Java web apps CI/CD on windows webapp and container based webaap for Azure DevOps project.
Restrcutured the Azure DevOps project Resource providers APIs.

projects.title: Server orchestration for distributed computing in VSTS Server side tasks.
projects.description:
Leveraged existing distributed task (open source) orchestration mechanism to schedule and run server side tasks triggered by users as part of CI/CD pipelines.
The project needed to be highly scalable and fail proof. It required working on Sql azure databases, Azure service bus, constructing distributed task orchestration and leveraging mechanism to automatically pick up one task a time with fall back mechanism. also had to put in limitations on per user allowance.
t
This mechanism is now being used to power Server Side Tasks in VSTS Release Management.

Technology used: C#, .Net, Distributed computing orchestrations mechanism (distibuted tasks), Azure Sql, Azure service bus, encrypting/decrypting data, Tasks schedulers.

projects.title: UI Grid extensions for VSTS tasks view
projects.description:
The requirement was for the extension to be able to read file and then display parameters in a key value editable grid.
For this I had to understand current framework on Knockout.JS and then design how the extension would work.
Had to use delegation to pass on function. This function would be used to get file data from git based repository or from build artifact.
Wrote a Json parser for extracting right parameters and there values.

projects.title: Azure CLI task
projects.description:
Designed and Implemented:

- An open source, Node.JS based task to be used in Azure DevOps
- Provided different option of logging into the command line via non-interactive flow and always handle clean up of the environment irrespective of the task execution status
- It went on to become one of the most used task in Azure DevOps with millions of executions in a day.

profile_positions.description:
Azure Global: March 2020 – present
Managed PAAS launch from August to September 2020:
-	Track bugs and follow up with team members to track progress.
-	Quality control
-	Deployment to dev, test, pre product and production environments for initial launch.
Architected Identity and Auth N/Z for Azure PAAS: Setup Auth N/Z for Azure PAAS with Azure Active Directory (AAD). 
-	Used MSAL and ADAL library with AAD applications & managed identities to setup Auth N & Z on UX and service.
-	The same model is now being adopted by other azure teams in Hyderabad and Bengaluru.
-	Login experience for the website.
Designed and Implemented backend for Data Sharing and Validation pipelines for Azure PAAS: Enabled customer to validate the data being shared with another customer via CDM schemas and enforce validation policies for data.
-	Implemented long running async jobs for our service to be able to run and poll pipelines with regular status updates.
-	Implemented clients to interact with other Azure Services like: Synapse, Data Share, Storage Account, Microsoft Graph
-	Collaborated with other team to create required framework for the solution to work.
Setup Cloud Infrastructure for website and service: 
-	Setup infra via CI/CD pipelines (deployments) for 
O	Azure Webapp (for website)
O	AZURE Service Fabric cluster on Azure Virtual machine scale set (service).
-	Setup secrets (certificates) storing, utilization and rotation in the service.
Design and implemented creation of Azure PAAS resources using ARM templates (UX and Service REST APIs):
-	REST APIS: CRUD calls for major resources offered in our Azure PAAS.
-	Implemented unit and end to end testing infrastructure.
-	Implemented UX for user to create required resources.
-	Populate ARM template for user inputs and use them over Azure REST APIs
-	Implemented live status updated in UX.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer 2

profile_positions.description:
Azure DevOps: June 2019 –  March 2020
‘Deploy to Azure’ – Extension for VS-Code IDE: 
Designed, Implemented and Launched (Microsoft Ignite conference, 2019) the extension. It analyses user’s code to bring out suggestions of Azure services to which customer’s code can be deployed to. The auto setup CI/CD pipelines in Azure Pipelines or GitHub Actions for the user based on their selection:
-	Designed and implemented Code Analyzer: Analyze code repository to produce the detected languages used and possible azure service to which user’s code can be deployed to.
-	Designed and implemented: Auto create YAML CI/CD pipeline for user’s code repository. Check in the YAML file and create CI/CD pipeline in Azure Pipelines/GitHub Repo.
-	Setup authentication with Azure Repos, Azure Pipelines and GitHub
-	Setup telemetry, monitoring system, and CI/CD pipeline for the extension.
profile_positions.title: Software engineer 2

profile_positions.description:
Azure DevOps: June 2016 – May 2019
Azure Pipelines tasks and Agents:
-	Designed and implement server-side tasks framework. Used Distributed Task Orchestration to run background jobs.
-	This framework has now been leveraged to add multiple server-side tasks by internal as well as external contributors.
-	Added/managed Azure cli, Azure rm manager, .Net Core tasks, Service Fabric tasks, Invoke Rest API
-	Managed .Net Core and Service fabric infrastructure in thousands of Azure Agent images used to create agent instances, like VS2016, VS2019.
Architected deployment resource database and REST API for Deployment Resource: Designed and implemented database and REST API’s for CRUD operations on DevOps Project. This data was then also connected to existing resources and piggybacked with them for additional insights. This was the first piece of data being handled/stored by our service.

Designed and implemented resource reuse in DevOps project: Designed an end-to-end system of how the service and front end will work together to enable reusing Azure resource while setting up DevOps project in Azure portal. As part of this, the following work was involved:
•	Changes to Deployment Resource Database tables and indexes
•	Stored metadata in Azure resources’ hidden tags
•	Changes to Portal extension service: to inculcate setting up the metadata as part of extensible approach, so that more metadata types can be contributed using extensions
Team members on the project: One another team mate to implement the UX side.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

volunteer_experiences.description: As part of giving campaign, i devoted one day to teach children at a Teach For India managed school in Hyderabad.
